levels.description: After deployment, loses <@ba.vdown>{morgan_s_2.hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP and gains a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> equivalent to <@ba.vup>{hp_ratio:0%}</> of Max HP (<$ba.barrier>Barrier</> decays over <@ba.vup>{shield_duration}</> seconds); Attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
